dkeep.logic

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelOne, LevelTwo

    public abstract class Level
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class responsible for handling Level's generic methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(char[][] map,
             int[][] victory_pos,
             boolean activity)
        Level's Constructor from a char[][] map, its victory positions and the enemies activity.
        Parameters:
        map - A matrix of chars containing the map's visual representation.
        victory_pos - A array of positions containing the victory positions of the map.
        activity - Boolean that if set all enemies are active, otherwise all enemies are inactive.

      • Level

        public Level()
        Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public Level.State update(int row,
                          int col)
        Updates game State with Hero Movement
        Parameters:
        row - Hero Position on the Horizontal Axis
        col - Hero Position on the Vertical Axis
        Returns:
        State of the game cycle after all the processing of the game variables.

      • nextLevel

        public abstract Level nextLevel()
        Function returning the next Level when the Hero reaches the victory position.
        Returns:
        next Level, when hero wins current Level.

      • getCharacters
